囏字的基本解释

囏
jiān
古同“艰”。

囏字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiān］
［《廣韻》古閑切，平山，見。］
“艱1”的古字。
(1)艰难。
(2)灾害。
(3)险恶。

囏字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　囏； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页215第24
【廣韻】古文艱字。註詳艮部十一畫。【周禮·地官·遺人】恤民之囏阨。【前漢·異姓諸侯王表】以德若彼，用力如此，其囏難也。

囏字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
囏字的起名意思

暂无。

囏
jiān
Gu Tong is "difficult."
囏
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiān］
["Guangyun" Ancient Xianqie, Hirayama, see you. ]
The ancient word "hard 1".
(1) Difficulty.
(2) Disasters.
(3) Sinister.
囏
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　囏; Kangxi Strokes: 23; Page Number: Page 215-24
[Guangyun] Ancient Chinese characters are difficult. Note the detailed eleven paintings in Gen. 【Zhou Li·Langguan·Widow】Comforting the people's shame. [Previous Han·Different princes Wang Biao] It is difficult to use such force.
